feed.title: Formbricks Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v2.6.0
entry.content:
Formbricks v2.6 introduces advanced logic jumps for surveys, allowing you to add more advanced branching logic to your surveys including variables, and/or conditions and many more. This release also includes a lot of bug fixes, big performance improvements to website and app surveys and a lot of stability improvements üöÄ

Thanks to all the contributors who help make Formbricks more robust and performant. üí™üôè

[!IMPORTANT]
Server-side action deprecation ‚ö†Ô∏è This release includes the last step of the server-side action tracking deprecation (previously used for segment filtering by performed actions). The migrations included in this release will delete all tracked actions from the database. If you still need these action records, please make sure to export them before upgrading.

[!IMPORTANT]
Data migration required ‚ö†Ô∏è This release includes a data migration to handle skipped CTA responses. Please follow the instructions on the Migration page in the docs to learn how to run the data migration needed.

What's Changed

  • feat: Advanced logic editor by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3020
  • feat: Add last used indicator on login page by @DivyanshuLohani in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3376
  • feat: Data table for persons by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3154
  • feat: Introduce Formbricks CX by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3152
  • feat: Make app surveys scalable by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3024
  • feat: Randomize row order matrix questions by @SaiSawant1 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3233
  • feat: Search bar in persons table by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3169
  • feat: adds auto animate to survey questions by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3147
  • feat: adds contact info question type by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3176
  • feat: custom data fetching for surveys table by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3318
  • feat: info about new formbricks version by @RajuGangitla in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3126
  • feat: product configuration pages loading skeletons by @PratikAwaik in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3262
  • feat: update CSAT template #3212 by @KartikDevarde2601 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3242
  • docs: add shareable dashboard page by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3188
  • docs: update page.mdx by @eltociear in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3265
  • fix: S3 endpoint was wrong in docs by @CaporalDead in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3182
  • fix: 50% scroll by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3174
  • fix: Add reference to the API in the Single Use Link docs #3257 by @prajyot004 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3280
  • fix: Added DialogTitle and DialogDescription components to the dialog. by @SaiSawant1 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3146
  • fix: Align the UI for the different survey states by @SaiSawant1 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3225
  • fix: Debug Mode Link in Website & App Connection page is broken #3544 by @Pranavx1 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3616
  • fix: Each child in a list should have a unique "key" prop by @EzyHow in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3533
  • fix: Error when setting up project in GitHub Codespaces by @sudovinay01 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3483
  • fix: Fixes issue where attempting to signin with google OAuth throws a "user exists" error instead of logging in by @Pushan2005 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3355
  • fix: Incorrect Error Toast for Ending Card by @Vardhaman619 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3306
  • fix: Make js assets cachable by @jonas-hoebenreich in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3337
  • fix: Moved Integrations in Formbricks Docs to Core Features by @himanshuraimau in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3551
  • fix: Oveview Page Redirect and Contributing Section Redirects Links‚Ä¶ by @iamitpal in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3365
  • fix: Update docs link to point to the quickstart (3539) by @Asymtode712 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3548
  • fix: Validate button link input to only accept URLs #3258 by @SatyanarayanPrashar in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3268
  • fix: add discord icon in organisation tab sub menu by @Pushan2005 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3349
  • fix: added brand color to loader #3205 by @RajuGangitla in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3237
  • fix: added logging in actionClient by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3695
  • fix: adding packages for vite plugins by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3688
  • fix: api errors by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3150
  • fix: attribute activity not loading by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3721
  • fix: autofocus and keyboard navigation issues by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3328
  • fix: billing tab by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3138
  • fix: broken redirect links in developer-docs/contributing by @naineel1209 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3343
  • fix: chromatic github action by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3357
  • fix: dark mode in demo apps #3209 by @anandaashish74711 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3241
  • fix: docs navigation dropdowns with the same title by @ChaseNelson in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3488
  • fix: fixed the gap issue in 2nd onboarding screen ui by @abhayofc in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3300
  • fix: getMonthlyOrganizationResponseCount for free plan users by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3219
  • fix: gitpod build error by @Abhi-Bohora in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3271
  • fix: height & width of survey preview when loading by @SatyanarayanPrashar in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3234
  • fix: improved person fetching by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3161
  • fix: issue of triggering opening and closing question paper on clicking on submenu options by @SharadK10 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3506
  • fix: keyboard opening unexpectedly by @devcodes9 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3278
  • fix: load more button applies filter by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3167
  • fix: load the script via src vs inline by @loremaps in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3330
  • fix: matrix survey sync issue by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3283

  • fix: person loading skeleton by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3160
  • fix: preserve last environment id by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3185
  • fix: product headline by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3173
  • fix: remove Buffer import from Pixel by @jonas-hoebenreich in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3168
  • fix: remove pulp ficiton from onboarding by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3187
  • fix: remove scrollbar in rich text editor by @harshrajeevsingh in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3236
  • fix: remove side quests from repo by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3312
  • fix: removed the tabs border by @Pratham271 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3282
  • fix: removes rewrites from next config by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3149
  • fix: response delete tooltip cut off by @jonas-hoebenreich in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3289
  • fix: rounded corners of NPS in email preview by @Pushan2005 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3290
  • fix: small typos by @jonas-hoebenreich in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3179
  • fix: sub-navigation sorting in docs by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3415
  • fix: survey preview updation issues by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3269
  • fix: template search functionality by @NawinKumarSharma in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3243
  • fix: toast Message while creating the survey by @smritidoneria in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3240
  • fix: too many enterprise license checks on the ee server by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3164
  • fix: typo in padding class name by @ChaseNelson in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3346
  • fix: unified capitalisation of settings cards by @Pushan2005 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3340
  • fix: update broken links in CONTRIBUTING.md by @Vardhaman619 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3298
  • fix: update displays data migration run out of memory on many displays by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3157
  • fix: update lower-level license files to match main license by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3247
  • fix: username overflow issue by @jonas-hoebenreich in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3501
  • fix: validations in integrations by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3238
  • fix: whitespace in status text should not break to next line by @EzyHow in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3547
  • fix: wrong tooltip in survey copy form by @jonas-hoebenreich in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3341
  • chore: bump the npm_and_yarn group across 2 directories with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3359
  • chore: bump the npm_and_yarn group across 2 directories with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3449
  • chore: Refactor display response relationship by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3100
  • chore: add docs build github action by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3358
  • chore: add react email dev server & fix package npm deps by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3350
  • chore: add turbo to nextjs dev server by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3529
  • chore: improve packages endpoint cache to save bandwidth by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3284
  • chore: improve pipeline performance by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3184
  • chore: move billing page under ee route by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3251
  • chore: prepare 2.6 release by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3531
  • chore: refactored ranking question by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3313
  • chore: removes actions from the backend by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3106
  • chore: removes stale action docs by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3166
  • chore: update js README for v3 release by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3334
  • chore: update prisma version by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3361
  • chore: update readme by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3601
  • chore: update ui package structure & add shadcn-ui cli support by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3178
  • chore: upgrade storybook & docs npm dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3342

New Contributors

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v2.7.0
entry.content:
Formbricks v2.7 includes all the features and improvements developed by the community during Hacktoberfest 2024 üî•. With this release, Formbricks is not only available in English, but also in German and Brazilian Portuguese üá©üá™üáßüá∑

We also introduce an advanced team-based access control system (requires Formbricks Enterprise Edition).

Thanks to all the contributors who help make Formbricks more robust and powerful. üí™üôè

[!IMPORTANT]
Database update ‚ö†Ô∏è This release sets the foundation for our upcoming AI features, currently in private beta. Formbricks now requires the pgvector extension to be installed in the PostgreSQL database. For users of our one-click setup, simply use the pgvector/pgvector:pg15 image instead of postgres:15-alpine.

[!IMPORTANT]
Data migration required ‚ö†Ô∏è This release includes a data migration to handle the changes on the access role feature. Please follow the instructions on the Migration page in the docs to learn how to run the data migration needed.

What's Changed

  • feat: AI-based Open-Text Summary by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3038
  • feat: Add Embed options to Survey cta bar and minor changes by @NawinKumarSharma in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3272
  • feat: Add back to top button on survey summary by @alok14598 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3292
  • feat: Added longterm retention check in template by @thefool76 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4061
  • feat: Update Insight category, document sentiment and archive insights by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4038
  • feat: [üïπÔ∏è] Add Template to Library (150 points) by @sateshcharan in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3947
  • feat: [üïπÔ∏è] Design a background (600 Points) (Double for animated) by @sateshcharan in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3937
  • feat: add 4 new survey templates by @jonas-hoebenreich in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4018
  • feat: add Employee Well-Being template by @jonas-hoebenreich in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3981
  • feat: add Helm chart for Formbricks with PostgreSQL, Redis, and Traefik by @rcperdgn in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3220
  • feat: add auto animate to web app components #3825 by @DivyanshuLohani in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3887
  • feat: add descriptive for question types by @ChaseNelson in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3356
  • feat: added windows bliss background by @shreykx in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3879
  • feat: career & professionl development survey by @adityadeshlahre in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4092
  • feat: granular team roles by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3975
  • feat: multi language UI by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3133
  • feat: oss.gg: add new background video by @Ionfinisher in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4123
  • feat: oss.gg: add new background video by @jonas-hoebenreich in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4017
  • feat: oss.gg: add new background video by @thefool76 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4051
  • feat: setup node with .nvmrc by @sateshcharan in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3941
  • feat: standardize menu ui by @devcodes9 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3333
  • fix(button): change loader color of secondary button to dark:text-slate-900 by @chrahman in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3795
  • fix: DE translations by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4216
  • fix: Delete account to signup page by @GouravIsCoding in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4162
  • fix: Direct Link in Docs don't open Navigation Submenu by @Dishantydv7 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3561
  • fix: Fixed the animation bug on the site by @thefool76 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4110
  • fix: Stop creation of empty name segments on people page by @DivyanshuLohani in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4028
  • fix: a11y contrast issues by @jonas-hoebenreich in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3722
  • fix: add text-center to fix date picker date background on hover by @DivyanshuLohani in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3916
  • fix: added webhook url test for a valid URL by @adityadeshlahre in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4007
  • fix: adds CSP header by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3754
  • fix: animate tweaks by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4015
  • fix: authclient error and delete integration issue by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3463
  • fix: back button label updation and onboarding container layout by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3868
  • fix: breaking summary page dropdown by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3764
  • fix: broken redirects on self-hosting > integrations docs by @naineel1209 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3998
  • fix: button size in all modals to size "sm" by @Chirag8023 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3799
  • fix: cal.com question not loading properly by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4251
  • fix: date picker ui-fix by @SaiSawant1 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3382
  • fix: date select highlight fix by @SaiSawant1 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4208
  • fix: error handling in insight generation by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4075
  • fix: github issue template linting issues by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4234
  • fix: handle incorrect 2FA OTP error by @BreakTos in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3935
  • fix: href to correctly update the active state on the sidebar by @DivyanshuLohani in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3573
  • fix: inconsistencies in survey summary by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4032
  • fix: mobile delay before showing survey doesn't work on react native by @Kozlove3 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3961
  • fix: navigation active link issue by @DivyanshuLohani in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3459
  • fix: onboarding template issue by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4221
  • fix: open specific nav group on docs page on first page load by @DivyanshuLohani in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4034
  • fix: person response page and copy link transalation issue by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4239
  • fix: preview mode change by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3737
  • fix: resolve recalls properly in document by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3943
  • fix: resposiveness issue in the survey's hidden fields by @DivyanshuLohani in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3952
  • fix: setting preview form data resetting by @Vardhaman619 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4182
  • fix: shiki package update from version 0.14.7 to 1.22.0 by @rajgupta-ml in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3542
  • fix: slack integration crashing by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4254
  • fix: suid screen getting stuck by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4229
  • fix: summary calculation in multi choice questions by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4022
  • fix: survey list spacing and loading by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4003
  • fix: survey status cron by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4252
  • fix: templates by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4227
  • fix: toast translation by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4228
  • fix: tweak ai ui by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3964
  • fix: ui of create new survey trigger by @SharadK10 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3703
  • fix: update twitter icon to x by @sarthak-kumar-shailendra in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4001

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v2.7.1
entry.content:
We are excited to announce the release of Formbricks 2.7.1 üî•

This patch release is packed with a lot of bug fixes and security improvements üöÄ üí™

Thanks to all the contributors who help make Formbricks more robust and performant. üí™üôè

What's Changed

  • feat: Expanded the options of time periods in filters by @khAja13 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4226
  • feat: adds does not include options in conditions by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4296
  • feat: promote dev-actions to prod by @SaiSawant1 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4245
  • fix: All roles need insight into consumption by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4242
  • fix: Back Button is Autofocused with No Margin in Modal by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4283
  • fix: Email Address Disclosure via URL in Registration Process by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4241
  • fix: add missing translation by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4266
  • fix: attribute activity tab crashing by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4276
  • fix: cache invalidation in sentiment and category update by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4295
  • fix: conditional in german translation by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4275
  • fix: correct className order in PricingTable component by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4277
  • fix: email enumeration via forgot password page by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4299
  • fix: formbricks not working in github codespace by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4289
  • fix: hostname regex by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4255
  • fix: increase card size for link surveys by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4285
  • fix: language error on template page by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4281
  • fix: rate limiting to forget password by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4297
  • fix: response cache invalidation on person delete by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4300
  • fix: restricting archived attributes in the survey and segment editor by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4269
  • fix: security checks for user input fields for email by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3819
  • fix: simplify LRU cache warning to avoid confusion by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4290
  • fix: slack integration with large organizations by @merteroglu in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3201
  • fix: styling fixes by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4279
  • fix: unresponsive table header and preview of inactive survey issue by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4258
  • chore: add expected behaviour to github bug template by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4292
  • chore: prepare 2.7.1 release by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4302
  • chore: remove docker-compose for dev environment by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4271
  • chore: remove old gitpod docs by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4259
  • docs: add beta notes to features currently under development by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4270
  • docs: add n8n community node note by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4280
  • docs: add recall from URL by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4260
  • docs: add support for Layer widget by @ayaang-layer in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4262

New Contributors

  • @merteroglu made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3201
  • @khAja13 made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4226
  • @ayaang-layer made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4262

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v2.7.0...v2.7.1

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v2.7.2
entry.content:
We are excited to announce the release of Formbricks 2.7.2 üî•

This patch release backports several important bug fixes to the 2.x branch and prepares Formbricks for the upcoming 3.0 release. üöÄ üí™

Thanks to all the contributors who help make Formbricks more robust and performant. üí™üôè

What's Changed

  • chore: next version upgrade by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4291
  • fix: recall in slack integration by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4304
  • fix: survey release and close bug for first date of the month by @SaiSawant1 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4311
  • fix: invite flow by @gupta-piyush19
  • fix: users cannot be deleted by @gupta-piyush19

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v2.7.1...v2.7.2

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.0.0
entry.content:
We're thrilled to announce the release of Formbricks 3.0, packed with powerful new features and improvements that make gathering insights and creating exceptional experiences easier than ever. üéâüéâüéâ

[!IMPORTANT]
Don't upgrade to 3.0 if you need SSO, user identification or cluster support on the community edition! With Formbricks 3.0, we're making some strategic changes to ensure long-term sustainability while keeping our core commitment to open source. While the Community Edition got more powerful, we're moving some advanced features to the Enterprise Edition. If you upgrade to 3.0 and run the data migration, there IS NO WAY BACK to 2.7.2 - if you need to use SSO or one of the other previously free features, either stick with 2.7.x or reach out for a custom quote.

Major new features ‚ú®

With our small team, we keep working hard to make Formbricks better for everyone: Our community as well as our Enterprise customers. Here are the highlights of Formbricks 3.0:

  • Multi-language support: üåç Complete UI now available in English, French, German, and Portuguese. Need another language? Get in touch üëã
  • Email Follow-ups: üìß Automatically send custom follow-up emails to your respondents, team mates or yourself
  • New "Contact" question type: üìù Capture and analyze contact information from your surveys.
  • AI Insights: ü§ñ Public beta for AI Insights generation for free text responses (BYO model on self-hosted)
  • Formbricks Wordpress Plugin: üîå Embed surveys in your WordPress site with ease, learn more here.
  • Teams and Access Rights: üë• Manage your team and access rights to specific surveys
  • Formbricks Cluster support & Helm Chart: ‚öì Deploy Formbricks on Kubernetes
  • Advanced Logic: üßÆ Add more complex logic to your surveys
  • Variables: üî¢ Add text and numeric variables to keep track of scores, prices, etc.
  • Performance: ‚ö° Decrease for in-product survey server load by ~80%
  • Automatic Migrations:‚ú® Makes upgrading to future versions of Formbricks a breeze.
  • Better filters, templates, and tons of bug fixes.

Learn more in our blog post for this release.

For details about the migration to 3.0.0 please visit our migration guide.

Thanks to all the contributors who help make Formbricks more robust and performant. üí™üôè

What's Changed

  • feat: product model revamp by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4353
  • feat: contacts revamp by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/3399
  • feat: new data migrations approach by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4466

  • feat: team users clean up by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4448
  • feat: french translations by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4395
  • feat: add multi arch to data-migration by @philippdormann in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4421
  • feat: add intercom by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4363
  • feat: adds vercel style guide in surveys package WIP by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4401
  • feat: allowed assigning of variable to open text number question by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4334
  • feat: Auth module revamp by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4335
  • feat: character limitations to free text question by @DeepaPrasanna in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4047
  • feat: created icon bar component in survey overview by @aryamantodkar in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4240
  • feat: logic fallback option added by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4306
